wikipedia_page.main: Mary Howarth Arden, Lady Mance,  (born 23 January 1947), known professionally as Lady Arden of Heswall, is a former Justice of the Supreme Court of the United Kingdom. Before that, she was a judge of the Court of Appeal of England and Wales.

response: #REDIRECT Mary Arden, Lady Arden of Heswall
